meanings.sent1: The leopardesses roamed the jungle with grace.
meanings.sent2: I saw two leopardesses resting under the tree.
meanings.sent3: The leopardesses decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like those of a leopardess on the prowl.
meanings.sent5: The leopardesses' spots shimmered in the sunlight, mesmerizing all who saw.

meanings.sent1: In the zoo, visitors admired the beautiful leopardesses.
meanings.sent2: The leopardesses in the wild moved stealthily through the bushes.
meanings.sent3: The leopardesses gathered for a group photo, looking fierce and majestic.
meanings.sent4: The leopardesses' unity was as strong as their individual beauty.
meanings.sent5: Among the leopardesses, one stood out with her unique markings.
